game.name: Deep
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Deep is a fast-paced underwater exploration game where you manage your oxygen while diving to rescue the crew of a sunken sub. Avoid deadly fish, dodge traps, and survive ocean whirlpools! Play solo or team up with friends in chaotic co-op dives to the depths!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Deep is a fast-paced underwater exploration game where you manage your oxygen while diving to rescue the crew of a sunken sub. Avoid deadly fish, dodge traps, and survive ocean whirlpools! Play solo or team up with friends in chaotic co-op dives to the depths!
